Spot The Court

Analyze basketball games using Machine Learning

We are Spot The Court

Spot-The-Court is a machine-learning project made for basketball games analysis
The system is written in Python GO and uses OpenCV, PyTorch, TensorFlow, YOLO v4 and many more..
You are more than welcome to ask us about the project and even try it yourself
Just go to the "Try it yourself" section on the menu and enjoy
